content: this is the november 2023 main square for ravelry s block a month bam cal come join in a fun and enthusiastic group making as many or as few squares as you like dedham is a picturesque village popular with tourists it is on the river stour which separates essex and suffolk with walking rowing boats and paddle boarding being popular activities it is also home to the alfred munnings art museum i have used stylecraft special dk in a apricot b shrimp c lemon and d saffron and e copper
